text: District 6 is one of the 22 districts Of Tehran. It is a vibrant and culturally rich district located in the central part of the city. It is known for its tree-lined avenues, upscale shopping malls, and diverse cultural offerings. The district is home to the University of Tehran, several theaters, and numerous bookstores. Additionally, it houses the Carpet Museum of Iran, which exhibits a collection of antique and modern Persian rugs. Overall, District 6 is a popular destination for both locals and tourists, offering a blend of modern amenities and cultural attractions. District 6 has an approximate population of 242,302 people and covers an area of about 20 square kilometers. Category:Cities in Tehran Province
title: District 6
